# Type Alias RequestBuilderToolChoice

RequestBuilderToolChoice:  
| { type?: "string"; [k: string]: unknown }  
| { function: { name: string; type: "function" }; type?: "function" }

Tool choice configuration for LLM chat request builder. Can specify either a string type or a function with a name.

For string values: "none", "auto", "required":

  * "none": the model will not call any tool and instead generates a message
  * "auto": the model can pick between generating a message or calling tools
  * "required": The model must call one or more tools And function specifies a particular tool the model should use



### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
